topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fbd0e163687234ade80100#post_53fbd0e163687234ade80100
Fun little story.
I was subbing for a 3rd grade class. These two girls brought a few MLP toys to play with during recess. Then this boy walks up and asks if he could play with them. They ask him why he wants to play with "girl toys". He says because he likes the show. So the two girls decide to quiz him. They ask the boy who his favorite character is. Do you know what his answer was? Spike! I immediately go to that kid and high five him and they ask if I like the show. We then proceeded to play with MLP toys for the next half hour.
